Position Title:             Centre ManagerEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                         up to 18K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:            Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Client:A prominent group based in Abu Dhabi, with international collaboration and successful track records in the areas of F&B, Retail and Entertainment. Job Description:  Exceed the operating profit as projected with your General Manager for your location by maintaining floor occupancy levels above 85% as well as by assisting client in settling in and prompt query resolution within 24 hours.
Manage people by assisting with recruitment and training of team members and working with Marketing team for events and guest speakers.
Keep CRM up to date with correct sales notice details & Agreements uploaded along with all sales opportunities as per the system standards.
Handle finance such as reviewing monthly profit and loss statements, ensuring precise charging and invoice issuance, accurately recording payments, and timely collection of payments.
Manage overall aspects of operations such as execution of signed Agreements with clients, recording rents and rent reviews, ensuring floor equipment is maintained, coordinating with Cloud Spaces IT for record and equipment upkeep, and attending at least one networking event per month.Skills
Skills:
28 to 40 years old and below
Minimum 5 years of UAE experience in the similar role
With relevant experience in a management level from a co-working space industry, hospitality or similar
With experience in sales or business development
Immediate joiners are preferrable
